'''The Hunt for the Ring''' is a text-adventure made by [[Sam Ruby]].<ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=5 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 6 (retrieved 29 October 2010)</ref> In this game the player needs to find [[the One Ring]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/hunt.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 29 October 2010)</ref> It constitues part five of ''[[The Lord of the Rings (Eamon series)|the Lord of the Rings]]'' series.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
